name: Videogames APP
description: Application using the RAWG API. Explore a vast collection of video games, learn details about your favorite titles and discover new gems from the world of video games.
tech: React, Redux, JavaScript, Express, Sequelize, PostgreSQL

name: Codecommunity
description: An app designed specifically for the software development community, this platform offers a unique way to make connections, share knowledge and collaborate on projects.
tech: React, Redux-toolkit, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Django, Python, PostgreSQL

name: Rick and Morty
description: Discover the exciting universe of Rick and Morty with this application, powered by an API dedicated to this acclaimed animated series. Immerse yourself in a huge catalog of characters.
tech: React, Redux, JavaScript, Express, Sequelize, PostgreSQL

name: Portfolio
description: Explore my web portfolio and discover a sample of my creative work and technical skills. Through an intuitive interface, I invite you to dive into a collection of projects that reflect my passion for web development and design.
